p: In December 2019, an outbreak of pneumonia of unknown origin was reported in Wuhan, Hubei Province, China. Most of these cases were epidemiologically linked to the Huanan Seafood Wholesale Market. Inoculation of bronchoalveolar lavage fluid obtained from patients with pneumonia of unknown origin into human airway epithelial cells and Vero E6 and Huh7 cell lines led to the isolation of a novel coronavirus, SARS-CoV-2, previously named 2019-nCov [ 1].
